text:
Wonderful experience!
The clinic assistants, Samantha & Sarah went above and beyond.
Despite my lateness, they handled everything smoothly and ensured my scan was completed without delay.
They also made sure I felt comfortable and at ease throughout the entire process.  Their friendly demeanor and helpful attitude made a significant difference.
A great experience overall!
Thank you!

I have been patronising Bethesda Medical @ Suntec for my medical requirements for many years and exclusively since they moved into their current 3rd floor premises at the north atrium. Samantha and her staff nurse team at reception have always attended to my registrations and other requests expeditiously and without delay, so as to ensure that all my visits were as pleasant and smooth-sailing as possible. Dr. Tina and her team of medical practitioners have also demonstrated thoroughness in their investigations as well as provided sound medical advice and treatment plans for whatever health ailments that plagued me. All in all, i am grateful to the entire medical team at Bethesda Medical @ Suntec for their many years of taking care of my requirements, and I wish all of them well.

I went there at around March 2025...This was my very 1st time served by this staff Nurse; Ms. Nana , she was very helpful, not only she's attended my appointment, she also the nurse that helped me for my blood test.
Totally Zer0 pain, she's very smiley and cheerful.
Kudos to staff nurse Ms.Nanaüëç Zero pain, zer0 side effects, fast and service with smile.
(Although I'm an adult but personally I don't really like when comes to take 1 stringe of my blood just because the work pass renewal health blood test. Haha.)

Dr Tong and now Dr Tina is our family doctor for the longest time. Very good doctors who takes time to listen and provide very good health for our long term well being. Supported by very dedicated and friendly staff like Samantha and Nana.

Friendly staff  and fully equiedwithhealt check up facilities. Doctors are professional and give additional advices on health related matters. One  additional thing that I like is the clinic is very Spacious and  I don‚Äôt feel that I am packed and squeezed with other patients.
